11.content:
Jennifer Aniston was sitting at her local coffee shop drinking her coffee and reading a newspaper. As she mindlessly carried on about her day, your associate was watching her from a van across the street. He was giving you updates on any changes she made as far as her location. You, on the other hand, were several miles away.

Jennifer got up and started walking down the street. Your associate picked up his radio.

“Hey boss, she finished her coffee and is moving northward.”

“Understood. Stay with her.”

You put down your radio and walk back to the bed. Upon it lay a strapped down, sweating, and very distressed looking Lisa Kudrow. She was breathing heavily in an attempt to recover from the intense round of ticking you and your ‘friends’ just gave her. She flinches as you sit down next to her.

“It is time to implement the next phase of our plan” you tell her. “This is where you come in. I have explained this to you before, so don’t mess it up. I don’t think I need to explain what happens if you fail…”

On that last line, you slowly trail a single finger down her stomach. Lisa snickers fearfully as you do. With some hesitation, she speaks up.

“How do I know you won’t just keep tickling me after I help you? What assurances do I have?”

“You have my word that neither I nor my associates will lay a finger on you if you get this right. I promise.”

Lisa looked at you wearily, but ultimately had little choice. She closed her eyes and nodded her head, the signal that she was willing to sell out her friend to save herself. You smile as you pull out a piece of paper and pick up her cell phone from the night stand. You hold the piece of paper up in front of Lisa and dial Jennifer’s phone number from her cell. When it starts ringing, you hold the phone up to her ear.

Jennifer hears her phone ringing and pulls it out of her purse. She sees that it’s her friend and fellow actress Lisa Kudrow. She answers with a smile.

“Hi, Lisa. How have you been?”

Lisa responds with as normal a voice as she can muster. “Oh I’m good, Jen; how about you?”

The two engage in small talk before Lisa asks her predetermined question.

“Hey Jen, have you got your nails done lately? I know this great spot that just opened up on Second Street.”

“Really? You know I think I’m due for a manicure. Is this place any good?”

“Oh, it’s the best. How about I meet you there?”

“Sounds great. What’s the address?”

Lisa read off the address that was written down on the paper you were holding up to her face. Jennifer punched in the address on her phone’s GPS.

“Hey, that’s just a short drive from here! Can I meet you there in 10?”

“Sure! I’ll see you then. Bye.”

You hang up the phone and put it back on the night stand. Lisa looks up at you with hopeful eyes.

“There. I did just as you said. Can you let me go now?”

You look down at her. She looks so sexy naked, hair disheveled, dripping with sweat and streaks of tears running down her face. It would be a shame to let her go. But you did give her your word.

On second thought, your exact words were that you and your associates wouldn’t lay a finger on her, a loophole that you could severely abuse. You smile as you think of the possibilities.

114.content:
“I said we would not lay a finger on you and I always keep my word. Jerry, break out those FS9’s you have in your bag.”

Your associate ‘Jerry’ sports a huge grin on his face as he reaches into his bag. He brings out two small devices. They look like metal sandals but the flat part is covered in circular brushes of varying size and softness. Jerry immediately went about strapping them to the bottom of Lisa’s feet; being especially careful as to ‘not lay a finger on her’. Lisa was sporting a mixed look of horror and confusion.

“What are you doing?! Please, just let me go! I did what you asked! Haven’t I’ve been tickled enough?!”

Your crew was smiling at Lisa’s frantic attempt to escape more tickling. Within a minute, Jerry had finished attaching his machines to her feet. He looked at you for final verification and with a nod from his boss, switched the machines on.

Lisa’s protests immediately turned to panicked laughter as the brushes rotated against the surface of her feet. Each brush was programmed with a varying speed and push against her soles to provide an ever-changing, unmercifully torturous foot tickling. Lisa closed her eyes and threw her head back while belting out unending laughter. She pulled at her restraints with what little strength she had remaining; if not to escape, then to provide some distraction from the unceasing brushes that violated her poor bare feet.

You continued to watch with undisguised joy. This may not be the worst tickling your gang has given her over the course of the last two days, but damn it was up there. After a couple of minutes you remembered you had an appointment to keep with an equally attractive (and hopefully equally ticklish) woman. You called your group to order.

“Gentlemen, ladies, it is time to continue on to the next phase. You all have your assignments. Good luck.”

The team started to gather their stuff and file out of the room. As they did, you turned to your associate, Jerry.

“Hey Jerr, how long is the battery life on those FS9’s?”

Without looking away from Lisa’s delightful torment, he answered.

“At current speed, those will last nearly 17 hours of continuous operation.”

“Good.” You replied. “In 16 hours, call me up and remind me to come back here…”

Your face broke out into a grin as you finished your sentence:

“With fresh batteries.”

You turned and made your way out of the room; Lisa’s laugh-riddled cries for mercy slowly drowning to the background. You walked out of the deserted warehouse and jumped in your car. Within a couple of minutes, you were at the previously established pick-up point: an abandoned retail store far enough from the public eye to make your next abduction. You park your car and look for Jennifer and your man following her.

1141.content:
You see her walk up to the abandoned store. She hesitates; she cannot find her friend Lisa or any other person for that matter. You see your lookout stealthily approach her, chloroform soaked rag in hand. You step out of the car to assist. Jennifer turns and sees you walking up to her.

“Um… Excuse me?” she asks. “Do you know if…?”

Her question trails off as she looks at you with trepidation. She seems to be unnerved by your smile and casual way of approaching her. You stop within a few feet in front of her. Just as she is about to ask you a question, a hand comes from behind her and clamps a white rag around her mouth and nose.

The struggle was quite brief. In her shock, Jennifer breathed in the fumes, quickening the incapacitation. With his left arm wrapped around her torso and his right hand keeping the rag in place, Jennifer Aniston had no chance of getting away. Your man was so skillful he did not even need your help; you just stood there and watched. Once her struggles had dropped off completely, you moved to help him.

As you pick up her feet, your lookout carries her from under her arms over to his van. With minimal effort, the two of you have her in the van, doors closed, no witnesses. You nod to your partner to indicate that he can drive her back to your headquarters now. As you turn to go back to your car, you get a transmission from your radio.

“Hey boss, this is Daniel.”

“Go ahead” you reply.

“Hey, did you set up any remote surveillance units in the area without telling me?”

Your face develops a quizzical look. That was an odd question, you thought. Of course you haven’t; it wasn’t necessary.

“Danny, you are my electronic surveillance guy. You should be the one who knows everything that’s going on in that department.”

“Right, well I’m detecting an unauthorized access of our tracking and communication systems coming from a device in your area.”

Your quizzical look turned into a scowl. You had enough projects to worry about without possible intrusion from an outside source. And knowing your particular ‘pastime’ it could be anybody, from both sides of the law.

“Where is it?”

After a few minutes of directions from Daniel and de-construction from you, you walk towards your car with the foreign device tucked under your arm. The device was unfamiliar to you, but not exotic. Anyone with a moderate understanding of electronic engineering could have made this. Storing it in the trunk of your car, you make your way back to H.Q.

By the time you make it there, Jennifer is blindfolded, stripped naked, and tied down to a bed in one of your numerous ‘exercise’ rooms. She has just started to gain consciousness, and is weakly pulling at her restraints and mumbling some form of question. As you enter the room, you can see your people setting up the necessary equipment: feathers, ice, a heart rate monitor, brushes, vibrators, an oxygen mask, q-tips, ect. A woman wearing a white lab coat and glasses walks up to you holding a clipboard.

“Afternoon, boss. We are almost ready to begin the exploration phase of her treatment.”

“Very good, Veronica.” Veronica was your lead ‘Sensitivity Tester’ for you organization. It is her responsibility to find out exactly where a target is ticklish and what techniques affect them the most. However, to maximize efficiency she can’t do the job alone. Luckily she never seems to have any problems finding volunteers to assist her.

“Are you going to stay around for the initial phase?” she asks you.

You think for a moment. The exploration phase is just testing. The real fun doesn’t start until all of her weaknesses are fully documented. Still, you can see other members of your team gathering just to watch; they enjoy a victim’s reaction when they realize just what is going to happen to them. On the other hand, there were other issues that needed attending to. That breach in security was worth investigating. And there’s always the acquisition of your next target to set up.

11412.content:
You decide to forgo viewing Jennifer’s introduction to your team’s ticklish machinations and head over to the security room. The walls are lined with monitors showing the various rooms and key points outside the compound. Sitting in front of a workbench is Daniel, one of your techs. He is busy dissecting the device you brought him.

“Hey Dan, what’s new?”

Without looking up from his work, he gives you the rundown of what he’s found out so far.

“Well, it’s not amateur. Whoever put this together has some good funding.”

“So, you think it’s the police or the feds?”

“Not necessarily. It could just as easily be from a well funded private group.”

You reflected for a moment. Starting this business has made you a lot of enemies. Luckily you had absorbed or defeated most of them a few years ago. Still, your enemy list is not completely empty, and there was always the possibility of a new threat in town. You see Daniel hook up his computer to the device via fiber optic cables.

“Will you be able to trace the originator with that?” you ask him.

“That’s what I’m hoping.”

You watch as Daniel hacks through a few simple firewalls before accessing the device’s memory cache.

“Alright, I’ve got an i.p. address. Starting trace.”

You watch as the computer goes through its trace program. When the program is finished, you have a better idea of just who is butting into your business.

12.content:
Jessica didn't know what had happened. One minute she had been walking down the street that warm April day, the next she had been seized by thugs, then bound and gagged and thrown into the back of a van. The van had driven for about ten minutes, then stopped. One of the thugs who had grabbed her climbed in, blindfolded her, slung her over his shoulder, and then climbed back out. He walked for about five minutes, and Jessica could hear voices whispering as he walked. She hoped someone could see the thug and would arrest him for carrying her off, but that was a folorn hope. Finally, the thug put her down in a chair, and Jessica relaxed slightly. Presently she was in no real danger. Suddenly, she smelled something strong under her nose. Ammonia, maybe? She passed out.

When Jessica woke, she found herself bound to a table. No one was in the room. The long shirt she had been wearing had been removed, leaving just the white T-shirt she was wearing underneath that on. Her legs were spread, not wide enough to make her feel vulnerable, but enough to make her feel a little awkward. Her arms were flung out, forming a T with the rest of her body.

Jessica's wondering about her surroundings (which were bare) were ended when she heard a door open behind her. A masked man walked into the room, with holes cut out of the mask for his mouth, eyes, and nose. The rest of his face was covered. He smiled disarmingly. "Hello, Jessica. Feeling comfortable?" Jessica could only stare in shock. "Ah. I see. Still a little stunned, are we? Very well, then." The man walked to a control panel that Jessica hadn't seen before. He pressed a button. Suddenly, Jessica felt her arms beginning to rotate. They came out of the T, forming a V...but they continued to be rotated until they were being held straight up. Her T-shirt, which had been short enough as it was, had risen just enough to expose her bellybutton and all of her belly from her navel down. She suddenly had a very bad feeling about all of this.

The man walked over to her, and unbuckled her belt. "You won't be needing this anymore." He took it off, and tossed it to the side. Then he unbuttoned her pants. Jessica thought she was going to be raped. But the man only pulled her pants down just a little way, so her entire belly was exposed, from just beneath her ribs to right above her panty line. He then took the gag off, and began walking around her in circles. "Hmmm...so, Jessica: are you ticklish?"


She shook her head frantically, and he laughed. "No? We'll see about that." He reached out a finger and...

121.content:
He began to trace his finger along her belly. She didn't react. Still smiling, the man poked her just above her belly button. That sent a shock through Jessica's body: she involuntarily bucked at that. The man chuckled, and with all four fingers began running them sideways across her lower belly, just beneath her belly button. Jessica gasped, and sucked in her belly, creating a bowl. She had always been unbearably ticklish, and now this masked man knew just that. He grinned wickedly. "So, you ARE ticklish. That makes my job a whole lot easier." He dug in a little harder with his fingers, seeking to reach the muscles just beneath the skin of her belly. Jessica began laughing: she couldn't help it. The man paused, withdrawing his hand. He studied his victim. She was bound, with her whole belly exposed to him. Her stomach was rising and falling quickly, as she was clearly nervous and waiting for his next move. The masked stranger didn't take long. He took his index finger, and began tracing small circles around Jessica's belly button. Jessica began giggling, while feverishly hoping that he wasn't about to do what she thought he planned to do. Unfortunately for Jessica, the man didn't seem inclined to ignore her vulnerability.

Suddenly, the man plunged his finger into her belly button, which, she now noticed, didn't have the ring in it she was accustomed to wearing. But that thought passed, as she was now roaring with laughter and bucking up and down on the table she had been bound to. Her only thought was to try and shake the man's finger out of her belly button, but he kept it in place. Tears were running down Jessica's face, she was laughing so hard, and her breath was only coming in gasps. For extra effect the man wiggled his finger in her navel, and that sent fresh shocks through her body, and she continued laughing. She had never felt so ticklish before in her life!
